content: this is the free pattern for this adorable rubber duckie this adorable bathtub playmate is reproduced in detailed crochet it stands four and a half inches long by three inches wide by three and a half inches tall this classic bath time buddy brings back many fond memories and if you take it in the bath it probably won t float but it will bring back fond memories of a simpler time **this pattern was extensively revised as of september 5 2010 please download again for amendments to the pattern **
